contents:
你只是不知道我說的英文能夠生活工作有餘罷了，中文是一種消閒的文字，不是一種治理國家的文字，尤其是法律...

Are you the shadow of the last ID I was talking to?
Please first tell me you are not a 50 cents.

As my experienced, not all English speaking people smart, don't think they can be above the average level over Chinese speaking people. But they are lucky to be born to use Chinese as mather language.
